data.name: ADD_PHRASE_TO_DICTIONARY_CONFIRMATION_MESSAGE
data.value: Would you like to add the phrase '{0}' to the dictionary with shortcut '{1}'?

data.name: ADD_WORD_TO_DICTIONARY_CONFIRMATION_MESSAGE
data.value: Would you like to add the word '{0}' to the dictionary?

data.name: BASS_UNABLE_TO_CREATE_STREAM_FROM_FILE
data.value: Bass was unable to create a stream from file '{0}'

data.name: CALIBRATION_CONFIRMATION_MESSAGE
data.value: Are you sure you would like to re-calibrate?

data.name: CALIBRATION_ERROR_MESSAGE
data.value: An error occurred during calibration. Message: '{0}'

data.name: CALIBRATION_REQUIRES_MANUAL_INTERACTION
data.value: Calibration cannot be completed without manual intervention, e.g. having to use a mouse. You may be stuck in the calibration process if you cannot manually interact with your computer. Are you sure you would like to re-calibrate?

data.name: CALIBRATION_STOPPED_MESSAGE
data.value: Calibration stopped for an unknown reason. Message: '{0}'

data.name: COLLAPSED_DOCK_THICKNESS
data.value: Collapsed dock thickness (as % of full dock thickness):

data.name: CORRUPTED_SETTINGS_MESSAGE
data.value:
Optikey has detected that your user settings file has become corrupted and must be repaired. This will be done by restoring an old version, or a default version if that isn't possible.
Click Yes to reset your user settings and restart.
Click No to close so that you can manually repair or copy your user settings file.

data.name: CORRUPTED_SETTINGS_TITLE
data.value: Uh-oh! The user settings file looks to be corrupt.

data.name: CRASH_MESSAGE
data.value:
Bad news - Optikey has tripped over its feet and has to close down.
An email with details of what happened would be very helpful: crash@optikey.org
Sorry for the inconvenience.

data.name: DICTIONARY_FILE_NOT_FOUND_ERROR
data.value: No user dictionary exists and original dictionary could not be found at path: '{0}'

data.name: DISPLAY_FOR_X_SECONDS_PER_CHARACTER_LABEL
data.value: Display for X seconds per message character:

data.name: ENTRY_ADDED_TO_DICTIONARY
data.value: Great stuff. '{0}' has been added to the dictionary.

data.name: INCOMPLETE_KEY_FIXATION_TTL_LABEL
data.value: Incomplete key fixation time to live (ms):

data.name: INTELLIGENTLY_SUPPRESS_AUTO_CAPS
data.value: ...but intelligently suppress auto-caps where it is probably unhelpful:

data.name: REQUIRED_SERVICES_NOT_PASSED_TO_MANAGEMENT_WINDOW
data.value: Audio and/or Dictionary service(s) were/was not supplied to the management window action.

data.name: RESTART_MESSAGE
data.value: Optikey needs to restart to apply your changes. Please click OK to continue with the restart, or CANCEL to discard your changes

data.name: RESUMING_INCOMPLETE_KEY_FIXATION_REQUIRES_NEW_LOCK_ON_LABEL
data.value: Resuming an incomplete key fixation requires a new lock on:

data.name: THE_EYE_TRIBE_ACTIVATION_ERROR
data.value: Unable to activate TheEyeTribe GazeManager! Please check that the server is running and the device is connected and try again.

data.name: THE_EYE_TRIBE_NOT_CALIBRATED
data.value: TheEyeTribe has not been calibrated. No data will be received until calibration is completed.

data.name: THE_EYE_TRIBE_UNABLE_TO_CALIBRATE_NO_ENGINE
data.value: Unable to attempt a calibration as no EyeX engine is available.

data.name: TOBII_EYEX_CALIBRATION_SUCCESS
data.value: Calibration completed, or possibly cancelled, but everything is working again!

data.name: TOBII_EYEX_ENGINE_NOT_FOUND
data.value: Tobii EyeX Engine cannot be found. Please install the EyeX Engine and try again.

data.name: TOBII_EYEX_ENGINE_NOT_RUNNING
data.value: Tobii EyeX Engine is not running. Please start the EyeX Engine and try again.

data.name: TRIGGER_WITHOUT_POSITION_ERROR
data.value: I can not detect where you are directing your attention. Is there a problem with the input device? Is it connected, turned on, calibrated, etc?

data.name: UNABLE_TO_DETERMINE_CURRENT_ELEVATION
data.value: Unable to determine the current elevation.

data.name: UNKNOWN_CALIBRATION_ERROR
data.value: Something went wrong, but I don't know what - please check the logs

data.value: Setting the suggestion method to: {0}. You can change this back from the Management Console (ALT + M).

data.name: USING_DEFAULT_VOICE
data.value: Setting the speech voice to the system voice: {0}. You can check the path for MaryTTS and change the voice back to it from the Management Console (ALT + M).

data.name: COMMUNIKATE_TOPPAGE_LOCATION_LABEL
data.value: Location of CommuniKate top page .obz file:

data.name: PRESAGE_CONSTRUCTOR_EXCEPTION_MESSAGE
data.value:
Optikey was unable to handshake with Presage. There are a few possible causes: 1.The DBFILENAME location specified in the presage.xml file (located in C:\Users\USER_NAME\.presage) does not exist - please check and correct this (or uninstall/reinstall Presage). 2.Either a 64 bit version of Presage is installed (Optikey only supports the 32 bit version), or the Presage files have been moved, deleted, or corrupted.
Please uninstall Presage and install the 32 bit version of 0.9.2. Optikey will attempt to continue, but there is a good chance it will crash shortly. The prediction method will be changed to NGram to prevent a crash on next run.

data.name: PRESAGE_CONSTRUCTOR_EXCEPTION_TITLE
data.value: There is a problem with Presage

data.name: DISCARD_CHANGED_SETTINGS
data.value: All changes made to the settings will be discarded, do you want to continue?

data.name: DICTIONARY_IS_PRESAGE
data.value: The Presage dictionary cannot be edited from here. It's default location is "C:\Program Files (x86)\presage\share\presage\database_en.db". It can be edited with a program which can read SQLite format 3 files such as "DB Browser for SQLite" (which is a free program).

data.name: ERROR_MAGNIFYING
data.value: An error has occurred during the magnification process. Please disable magnification and contact Optikey for further support.

data.name: STARTUP_CRASH_TITLE
data.value: Uh-oh! We've encountered the following errors during startup:

data.name: IRISBOND_TRACKER_COULD_NOT_BE_STARTED
data.value: Irisbond Duo tracker could not be started.

data.name: IRISBOND_TRACKER_NOT_FOUND
data.value: Irisbond Duo tracker cannot be found. Please check the tracker's connection and try again.

data.name: IRISBOND_CALIBRATION_COMPLETE
data.value: Calibration completed (success or failure), but everything is working again!

data.name: DYNAMIC_KEYBOARD_HEIGHT_ABOVE_THRESHOLD
data.value: The defined height of this dynamic keyboard is too large (> 95% of screen)

data.name: DEFAULT_UILANGUAGE_TO_URDU
data.value: We recommend changing the UiLanguage to Urdu to ensure typed Urdu text flows from right to left in the scratchpad. Would you like Optikey to automatically set the UiLanguage to Urdu?

data.name: FONTFAMILY_IS_NOT_COMPATIBLE_WITH_URDU_LANGUAGE
data.value: We recommend changing the font used in Optikey to one which is fully compatible with Urdu. If a font is used which is not Urdu specific then text, and especially numbers, may display incorrectly. Would you like Optikey to automatically set the font to Nafees Web Naskh?

data.name: LANGUAGE_SPECIFIC_FONT_RECOMMENDED
data.value: A language specific font is recommended

data.name: UILANGUAGE_AND_KEYBOARDANDDICTIONARYLANGUAGE_DIFFER_TITLE
data.value: UI and Keyboard/Dictionary languages are different

data.name: TYPE_DIACRITICS_AFTER_LETTERS
data.value: Type diacritic marks (accents etc) after letters:

data.name: DEFAULT_UILANGUAGE_TO_PERSIAN
data.value: We recommend changing the UiLanguage to Persian to ensure typed Persian text flows from right to left in the scratchpad. Would you like Optikey to automatically set the UiLanguage to Persian?

data.name: FONTFAMILY_IS_NOT_COMPATIBLE_WITH_PERSIAN_LANGUAGE
data.value: We recommend changing the font used in optiKey to one which is fully compatible with Persian. If a font is used which is not Persian specific then text, and especially numbers, may display incorrectly. Would you like Optikey to automatically set the font to Nazli?

data.name: ERROR_HANDLING_INPUT_SERVICE_SELECTION_RESULT
data.value: An error has occurred during the handling of a key selection

data.name: LOAD_DICTIONARY_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Load the dictionary to review, add or delete words.

data.name: ALIENWARE_17_INFO
data.value: This requires an Alienware 17 gaming laptop, using the built-in Tobii eye tracker

data.name: GAZE_TRACKER_INFO
data.value: This requires the ITU Gaze Tracking Library, which is a framework for open source eye tracking using off-the-shelf components, such as webcams and videocameras.

data.name: IRISBOND_DUO_INFO
data.value: If you plan to use Optikey with the Irisbond Duo eye tracker then please make sure you have the Irisbond Duo drivers installed. These can be downloaded from https://www.irisbond.com/products/downloads.

data.name: MOUSE_POSITION_INFO
data.value: In this mode, Optikey will use the mouse cursor as input instead of talking directly to an eye tracker. You might want this if you're testing Optikey out, or if you want to use it with an alternative input device such as a head mouse or any eye tracker not in this list.

data.name: TOBII_ASSISTIVE_INFO
data.value: To use Optikey with an assistive eye tracker, you either need the new version of Windows Control, or the Tobii Eye Tracking engine. If you need to use the old version of the Tobii Windows control application (including Tobii Gaze Interaction settings), then you will need to control Optikey using mouse position instead.

data.name: TOBII_EYEX_INFO
data.value: This option will work with any Tobii Gaming eye tracker (4C, EyeX, Alienware, Steelseries, etc)

data.name: VI_MYGAZE_INFO
data.value: The Visual Interaction myGaze is only supported if you've already installed the myGaze client drivers, which are no longer available for download. If you don't have these drivers installed, you should select use 'mouse position' instead, and use Optikey in combination with the myGaze EyeMousePlay application to move the cursor.

data.name: ALLOW_MULTIPLE_INSTANCES
data.value: Allow multiple instances of this Optikey app to run simultaneously

data.name: ERROR_DURING_TRANSLATION
data.value: An error has occured during the translation of text

data.name: ENABLE_OVERRIDE_TRANSLATION_API_KEY_LABEL
data.value: Use a different Yandex Translation API key?
